content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to the personal life of Mustapha or any real individual. However, in general, passion for music can evolve and grow with age as an individual gains more exposure, experience, and knowledge about different types of music, instruments, and styles. They may also develop skills in playing, composing, or producing music, leading to a deeper appreciation and love for the art form. Mustapha's passion for music may have similarly evolved as he got older through exposure to new music, practice, and learning.
